DataElement.preferredName: Trunk And Extremities Soft Tissue Sarcoma AJCC Edition 8 Clinical Regional Lymph Node N Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities based on evidence obtained from the date of cancer diagnosis until the start of definitive treatment, or within four months (whichever is shorter), using AJCC Ed. 8 criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Trunk And Extremities Soft Tissue Sarcoma Clinical N Category
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The body excluding the head and neck and limbs._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Body limbs, consisting of right upper and lower (arm and leg) and left upper and lower (arm and leg). (CADSR)_A malignant neoplasm arising from muscle tissue, adipose tissue, blood vessels, fibrous tissue, or other supportive tissues excluding the bones._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

DataElementConcept.origin: AJCC Based:Staging Criteria Based on American Joint Committee on Cancer System
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: TL released; 2/24/22.; 4-2-19 created for AJCC Ed. 8; tmt.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Soft Tissue Sarcoma Trunk And Extremities American Joint Committee on Cancer Edition 8 N Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A finding about one or more characteristics of soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)_A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities pN1 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities pN1 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities pN1 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities pN0 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities pN0 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities without regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities pN0 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities without regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)
